name: Killer Instinct
overview: Killer Instinct. First it tore into the arcades. Then it burst into your house only on the Super NES. Now, it comes home again, this time on Game Boy! Choose from eight characters, including T.J. Combo, Fulgore, Jago, B. Orchid, Chief Thunder, Spinal, Sabrewulf, and Glacius, and battle your way to victory in Killer Instinct. The same great combo strategies are there along with power-packed special moves and gruesome danger moves. Learn each character's special attacks and combinations in the Practice mode, and when you are ready for competition, challenge a friend or take on the Arcade mode. Killer Instinct is also powered up on Super GameBoy! Brawl it out in high-tension arcade action!
